Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-01: Can you enforce password/passphrase aging requirements?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-02: Can you enforce password/passphrase complexity requirements [provided by the institution]?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-03: Does the system have password complexity or length limitations and/or restrictions?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-04: Do you have documented password/passphrase reset procedures that are currently implemented in the system and/or customer support?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-05: Does your web-based interface support authentication, including standards-based single-sign-on? (e.g. InCommon)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-06: Are there any passwords/passphrases hard coded into your systems or products?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-07: Are user account passwords/passphrases visible in administration modules?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-08: Are user account passwords/passphrases stored encrypted?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-09: Does your application and/or user-frontend/portal support multi-factor authentication? (e.g. Duo, Google Authenticator, OTP, etc.)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-10: Does your application support integration with other authentication and authorization systems?  List which ones (such as Active Directory, Kerberos and what version) in Additional Info?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-11: Will any external authentication or authorization system be utilized by an application with access to the institution's data?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-12: Does the system (servers/infrastructure) support external authentication services (e.g. Active Directory, LDAP) in place of local authentication?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-13: Does the system operate in a mixed authentication mode (i.e. external and local authentication)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-14: Will any external authentication or authorization system be utilized by a system with access to institution data?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-15: Are audit logs available that include AT LEAST all of the following; login, logout, actions performed, and source IP address?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-16: Describe or provide a reference to the a) system capability to log security/authorization changes as well as user and administrator security events (i.e. physical or electronic)(e.g. login failures, access denied, changes accepted), and b) all requirements necessary to implement logging and monitoring on the system. Include c) information about SIEM/log collector usage.

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - AAA (v2.11)
Question: AAAI-17: Describe or provide a reference to the retention period for those logs, how logs are protected, and whether they are accessible to the customer (and if so, how).
